name: test_account_negative_scenarios[Alice Smith]
description:
Test negative scenarios like Missing Fields.
    Uses 'accounts_api_manager' to authenticate, proving that even valid users
    cannot send invalid data (422 Unprocessable Entity).

parameters.name: row
parameters.value: {'tags': 'regression', 'scenario': 'missing fields', 'account_holder_name': 'Alice Smith', 'dob': '', 'gender': 'Female', 'email': 'alice.smith@example.com', 'phone': '+1-555-0201', 'address': '78 Park Lane, Chicago, IL', 'zip_code': '60616', 'account_type': 'Current', 'balance': '25000.75', 'status': 'Active', 'services': 'Internet Banking,SMS Alerts', 'marketing_opt_in': 'false', 'updated_account_holder_name': 'Alice Johnson', 'updated_dob': '1988-03-15', 'updated_gender': 'Female', 'updated_email': 'alice.johnson@example.com', 'updated_phone': '+1-555-0201', 'updated_address': '90 Lake View Rd, Chicago, IL', 'updated_zip_code': '60618', 'updated_account_type': 'Current', 'updated_balance': '27000.00', 'updated_status': 'Active', 'updated_services': 'Internet Banking,Cheque Book', 'updated_marketing_opt_in': 'true'}
